definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Its predecessor is Beijing Timber Plant's dismountable house subsidiary.
sentences.chinese: 前身是北京市木材厂活动房屋分厂。

sentences.english: When he goes back to his mobile home, that's when it's.
sentences.chinese: 当他回到自己的活动房屋时，那就是他的时间了。

sentences.english: Conditions inside some of those caravans are bad.
sentences.chinese: 在有些活动房屋里的生活条件是非常艰苦的。

sentences.english: If you are a mobile house, this is a good time to buy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想买活动房屋，这是个购买的大好时机。

sentences.english: He lives alone in a mobile home near a lake.
sentences.chinese: 他独自住在湖畔的一座活动房屋里。
他们一起搜索了活动房屋。
我们乘拖车式活动房屋在乡间旅行。

sentences.english: Some even choose to live in mobile homes, or cars that act as a home!
sentences.chinese: 有些人甚至选择住在活动房屋，或汽车里。

sentences.english: I hear that you want to buy a mobile home in America.
sentences.chinese: 我听说你想在美国买间活动房屋。

sentences.english: Would you like a duplex or a mobile home?
sentences.chinese: 你想要双层楼公寓还是活动房屋？

definition: temporary housing built with wooden planks or other makeshift materials
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
to build (esp. with simple materials)/to knock together (a temporary shed)/to rig up
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
